Source.Name: dvdauthor
Source.Summary: A set of tools to help you generate DVD files to be played back on a standalone DVD player
Source.Description: DVDAuthor is a set of tools to help you author the file and directory structure of a DVD-Video disc, including programmatic commands for implementing interactive behaviour.
